name: Capital Region Lost & Found
description:
Capital Region Lost & Found is a digital scrapbook of writing and references inspired by key local institutions and formative events in the modern history of New York's Capital Region.

It's a linked series of hypertext poems and autobiographical writing about where we find ourselves, and what we have lost along the way.

This is a work in progress that I am making in four parts - one each for Albany, Schenectady, Troy, and Saratoga. The Albany section is the only one that is currently playable, but the rest will soon follow.

Created for Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: "Lost and Found"
